lines.irish: Fáiltigí go Ceacht mo Chara (Hello)
lines.english: Welcome to Mo Chara's Lesson (Hello)

lines.irish: Foghlaim seo agus ní bheidh tú ag teacht sa dara háit
lines.english: Learn this and you won't be coming second

lines.irish: Banging out 3CAG agus mé ar stáitse
lines.english: Banging out 3CAG while I'm on stage

lines.irish: Ar seachrán ó na Gardaí ón tseachtain seo caite
lines.english: Evading the guards from last week

lines.irish: Tá éad orthu mar gheall go bhfuil mo pubes ildaite
lines.english: They're jealous because my pubes are colourful

lines.irish: Faic fágtha le rá
lines.english: Nothing left to say

lines.irish: Don't change the drug laws because I'm raking it in gach lá
lines.english: Don't change the drug laws because I'm raking it in every day

lines.irish: Ach sílim gur gá do na Péas iad féin a choinneáil stuama
lines.english: But I think the guards need to keep themselves steady

lines.irish: Ar Bhóthar na bhFál ní bheidh tú i bhfad ar shiúl ó phetrol-buama
lines.english: On the Falls Road you're never far from a petrol bomb

lines.irish: Buama peitril ag éist' le techno beidh mise ar shiúl ní bheidh mise le feiceáil
lines.english: Petrol bomb with techno blaring – I'll be gone, unseen

lines.irish: Gardaí ag seiceáil tá mise ag pacáil amach sna sléibthe cosúil le jackal
lines.english: Cops checking, I'm packing out in the mountains like a jackal

lines.irish: 'Cause that's where I hide, níl an RUC on my side
lines.english: That's where I hide, the RUC aren't on my side

lines.irish: Just ar feadh cúpla, an méid sin, táim ar ais i focain paradise
lines.english: Just for a few, that's it, I'm back in f***ing paradise

lines.irish: An Gaeilgeoir 'Mr. Nice' a chuirtear orm
lines.english: They call me the Irish-speaking 'Mr. Nice'

lines.irish: Ar fáil fríd an ghrian, ghaoth, bháistí agus stoirm
lines.english: Available through sun, wind, rain and storm

lines.irish: Mar tá sneachta ann 'ar go' ó Mo Chara ar lá tirim
lines.english: Because there's snow 'on the go' from Mo Chara on a dry day

lines.irish: Agus tá Dan Healy paranoid faoi achan abairt a dheirim
lines.english: And Dan Healy is paranoid about every line I say

lines.irish: Fuck the Pope, I'm selling dope le Bishop Brennan
lines.english: F*** the Pope, I'm selling dope with Bishop Brennan

lines.irish: Fuck the Queen, I'm selling green le achan cunt sa Kremlin
lines.english: F*** the Queen, I'm selling green with every c*** in the Kremlin

lines.irish: LSD nó piollaí, focain díolaim an t-iomlán
lines.english: LSD or pills, I sell the whole f***ing lot

lines.irish: ("How many should I take, Mo Chara said three or something?")
lines.english: ("How many should I take? Mo Chara said three or something?")

lines.irish: Pearsantachtaí difriúla when I'm selling an 3CAG
lines.english: Different personalities when I'm selling 3CAG

lines.irish: Múinte le posh pricks and acting hard leis na scumbags
lines.english: Polite with posh pricks, act tough with the scumbags

lines.irish: Sometimes you have to bite your tongue leis na meánaicmigh
lines.english: Sometimes you have to bite your tongue with the middle class

lines.irish: Exactly, due the focain airgead sexy
lines.english: Exactly, because the f***ing money is sexy

lines.irish: Eventually, imíonn siad, couple o' quid down
lines.english: Eventually, they're gone, a few quid down

lines.irish: The clowns, running around, saying that legend Mo Chara's sound
lines.english: The clowns, running around saying Mo Chara's a legend

lines.irish: Ach i bhfírinne bhí orm é a dhíol níos daoire daofa
lines.english: But truthfully, I had to sell it dearer to them

lines.irish: Mar bím i gcónaí ag iarraidh go mbeidh sé níos saoire do na
lines.english: Because I'm always trying to make it cheaper for the

lines.irish: Leaids as an cheantar nach bhfaigheann laethanta saoire ar bith
lines.english: Lads from the area who never get holidays at all

lines.irish: Sniff that mate and you'll be back in Ibiza arís
lines.english: Sniff that mate and you'll be back in Ibiza again

lines.english: Everyone's worried about Mo Chara

lines.irish: Mar gheall go bhfuil barraíocht ama aige
lines.english: Because he's got too much time

lines.irish: Mar go bhfuil barraíocht bán aige
lines.english: Because he's got too much white

lines.irish: Mar gur as Bóthar na Carraige
lines.english: Because he's from Rock Road

lines.irish: Báine dó
lines.english: Too pale for him

lines.irish: Is léir go bhfuil Mo Chara the opposite the [?]
lines.english: It's clear that Mo Chara's the opposite of [?]

lines.irish: Ní imrím cluichí seachas Cribby 'is Dizzy Dinosaurs
lines.english: I don't play games except Cribby and Dizzy Dinosaurs

lines.irish: Inseoidh mé duit once more
lines.english: I'll tell you once more

lines.irish: Ní shílim i bhfírinne gur chóir
lines.english: I truly don't think you should

lines.irish: Éisteacht le RTÉ nó beidh cuairteoir at your Ma's front door
lines.english: Listen to RTÉ or there'll be a visitor at your ma's front door

lines.irish: Smashing up your radio then giving myself fellatio
lines.english: Smashing your radio and giving myself fellatio

lines.irish: I dteach do mháthar a gimp suit leathair
lines.english: In your mother's house in a leather gimp suit

lines.irish: Hanging in her patio
lines.english: Hanging in her patio

lines.irish: I still prefer your Granny though
lines.english: I still prefer your Granny though

lines.irish: Burting her like a fanny coat
lines.english: Riding her like a furry coat

lines.irish: Horn agus féasóg uirthi, she look's like a manly goat
lines.english: Horn and beard on her – she looks like a manly goat

lines.irish: Kneecap, givin' your Da a vesectomy
lines.english: Kneecap, giving your Da a vasectomy

lines.irish: I'll beat your brother at FIFA when your Ma is erectin' me
lines.english: I'll beat your brother at FIFA while your Ma's getting turned on by me

lines.irish: Tá do dheirfiúr next to me, I'm selling her ecstasy
lines.english: Your sister's next to me, I'm selling her ecstasy

lines.irish: Rapping i ndátheangach coursing through my anatomy
lines.english: Rapping bilingually flowing through my anatomy

lines.english: When the guards do a search

lines.irish: Mar tá mo dope about an inch and a half up my crack

lines.irish: De réir boring bastards, tá mé drochbhéasach
lines.english: According to boring bastards, I've bad manners

lines.english: Like when I wipe my arse with your wee sister's vest top

lines.irish: Agus chuir mé i bhfolach é in a charity shop (Eugh)
lines.english: And I hid it in a charity shop (Eugh)

lines.english: I can't die and I'll never retire
